profile_summary:
As a Field Service Engineer with 8 years of experience, I excel at delivering **KI-gestützte Lösungen** in the healthcare and financial sectors. My technical expertise includes advanced **Service-Software** implementation and the use of modern **digitale Tools** for installation, maintenance, and repair of systems, ensuring compliance with quality standards. I possess a strong foundation in **Qualifizierung** and **Verifizierung**, and have demonstrated my ability to troubleshoot, analyze, and resolve complex technical issues efficiently. I bring to the table exceptional organizational and communication skills in both German and English, coupled with a willingness to travel as needed. 
Additionally, my experience includes full-stack development utilizing **JavaScript**, **TypeScript**, **Python**, **Flutter**, and several frameworks such as **React**, **Next.js**, **Vue**, **Node.js**, **FastAPI**, and **Django**, supported by robust cloud solutions in **Azure** and **AWS**. I have successfully led projects that integrate **AI/ML capabilities** for enhanced service delivery and real-time data processing, grounded in a deep understanding of microservices architecture and CI/CD automation.
